name: Doc's Arcade
description: Earn Points for Indie Video Games by playing the Indie Video Games App: Doc's Arcade! Play Solo Mode and compete for high scores, or challenge other players in VS Mode. From quick, intense games like Beer Juggling and Ninja Stars to epic adventures in Hambert's Dumb Adventure and Waffle Time (plus 11 more games somewhere in between), you'll be earning so many Points, you won't know what to do with them all! (We're sure you can figure something out.)
